author: ivan
msg: * trunk: Add the tsvn:logwidthmarker property which is used by TortoiseSVN
to show a marker in the commit dialog at width 78.

author: ivan
msg: * serf.mak: Use macros to make it simpler.

author: ivan
msg: * test/CuTest.h: The CuTest framework version 1.4, no
(main): Run specified test suites or just list them.
test_server_destroy): Initial implementation of test server
which replays series of actions on connection.
(test_serf_connection_create): Test that requests are sent and completed
Fix compilation warnings from GCC 4.1.1.  Two compilation warnings
buckets/ssl_buckets.c:765: warning: dereferencing type-punned pointer will break strict-aliasing rules
buckets/ssl_buckets.c:780: warning: dereferencing type-punned pointer will break strict-aliasing rules
(main): Make initialization of fields in local variable "accept_ctx"
obvious to the compiler (it also occurs in accept_response()).
